body: I don't like having flags like these. Implementations should be swapped by changing backends. Pure python functions should go to `torch/nn/functions`, THNN functions go to `torch/nn/functions/thnn`, so cuDNN should be in `torch/nn/functions/cudnn`. Then in `torch/nn/backends/cudnn.py` add a cuDNN backend that gathers the functions you've implemented.
